attributes.action: Allow a referendum on the EU deal agreed on 23rd July 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister has agreed a deal with the EU, the people of this country have the right to scrutinise this deal. The full draft of this treaty needs to be published so that we all know what the Prime Minister is signing up to.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Treatyeuro/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
